title: The complete works of Robert Burns :
author: Burns, Robert
snippet: Besides copies supplied to William Parker, Thomas Samson, Ralph Sellars, and John Rankine of Adamhill, the following persons obtained the number of copies attached to their respective  names :— John Kennedy, Dumfries House, 20 ; John Logan of Laight, 20 ; Mr. M'Whinnie, Writer, Aj-r, 20 ; David Sillar, Irvine, 14 ; William Niven, Maybole, 7 ; Walter Morton, Cumnock, 6 ; John Neilson, Kirkoswald, 5.
